home.checkRegistrationDescription: Enter your IMEI code to get information about your device. You can quickly and easily check if your device is registered.

errorModal.title: Error
errorModal.description: The IMEI code is incorrect. IMEI must consist of 15 digits. Please check the code and try again.

successModal.imeiInfo: Attention! This device has been purchased on an installment plan!
successModal.imeiDescription: Restrictions may apply until all payments for this phone are completed. Before purchasing, make sure to check its payment status.
successModal.trustedPurchase: Buy reliable and certified smartphones only from the official <1>Asaxiy.uz</1>!

birdaModal.title: Birda
birdaModal.description: Registration of IMEI code through the BIRDA mobile application for resident and non-resident individuals
birdaModal.step1: Review the public offer of the BIRDA mobile application
birdaModal.step2: Go to the section for registering the IMEI code
birdaModal.step3: Fill out the electronic form by entering the IMEI code(s)

myGovModal.title: myGov
myGovModal.description: Registration of the IMEI code of the mobile device through the myGov mobile application by individuals
myGovModal.step1: Review the public offer of the myGov mobile application
myGovModal.step2: Register in the myGov mobile application
myGovModal.step3: Select the service for registering the IMEI code of the mobile device
myGovModal.step4: Fill out the electronic form with the IMEI code(s)

operatorModal.title: Operators
operatorModal.descriptionLocals: Registration of the IMEI code of the mobile device by an individual (resident) in person
operatorModal.stepForLocals2: Provide the subscriber number registered in the name of the applicant at the local mobile operator
operatorModal.stepForLocals3: Provide the mobile device with the IMEI code(s)
operatorModal.stepForForeigners2: Provide the subscriber number registered in the name of the applicant at the local mobile operator with non-resident status
operatorModal.stepForForeigners3: Provide the mobile device with the IMEI code(s)

gmailModal.title: Post
gmailModal.description: Registration of IMEI code for residents at postal service points
gmailModal.residents: To register the IMEI code, a resident must personally visit the post office with a passport and phone. The SIM card of the local operator must be registered to the same passport. If the device was received by mail, a sealed envelope is required.
gmailModal.nonResidents: To register the IMEI code, a non-resident must personally visit the post office with a passport and phone. The SIM card of the local operator with non-resident status must be registered to the same passport. If the device was received by mail, a sealed envelope is required.
gmailModal.stateless: Stateless persons can register the IMEI code(s) of their mobile device through a biometric document issued in accordance with the procedure established by the Cabinet of Ministers of the Republic of Uzbekistan.

notFoundModal.title: Your phone's IMEI number has not been registered on our website!
notFoundModal.description: If you are selling your device on an installment plan, register the IMEI number. Without IMEI registration, there may be restrictions on network usage!

registerUserModal.title: IMEI Registration
registerUserModal.phoneMismatch: The buyer's and seller's phone numbers cannot be the same
